duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and cook high-quality chicken finger meals in a fast-paced restaurant environment.
Work various shifts to accommodate opening, closing, and other operational requirements.
Receive paid training and opportunities for career growth within the restaurant.
Ensure cleanliness and adherence to safety procedures in the kitchen and dining areas.
Provide friendly and efficient customer service while taking orders and processing payments.
Lift and carry heavy objects, clean and maintain restaurant areas, and communicate effectively with team members.
